Awesome all in one, i was planning to get them all when they come out but i cant wait anymore!

Quick question,

I downloaded each episode as they came out, always the reloaded version. Each time i installed the game it made a new shortcut on the desktop.

All 3 shortcuts have the same pathway, but the first one only allows the first episode to the be played, second allows first two, third allows all 3.

However when i open the most recent shortcut, the previous game files are not present. I don't really want to re-play the previous epsiodes, is there a way around this?

Why all the negative votes? 
I hope it is working fine.
